```{r setup}
library(SEraster)

## data
library(MERINGUE)
data("mPOA")

## create spatial experiment object
spe <- SpatialExperiment::SpatialExperiment(
  spatialCoords = as.matrix(mPOA$pos),
  colData = mPOA$annot,
  assays = list(volnorm = mPOA$mat)
)
spe

## rasterize gene expression
rastGexp <- SEraster::rasterizeGeneExpression(spe, assay_name="volnorm", resolution = 50)
## rasterize cell type
rastCt <- SEraster::rasterizeCellType(spe, col_name = "main", resolution = 50)

## plot
SEraster::plotRaster(rastGexp)
SEraster::plotRaster(rastCt)
```
